Our open source projects

Hey there! You can find a list of our open source projects here. We haven't written a blog post about each of them, but if there is one, it's linked as well.

Ruby

  • mt940_parser - work with SWIFT formatted files
  • chewy_kiqqer - couple chewy (elasticsearch) with sidekiq
  • fakery - generate JSON formatted fake objects to test SOA
  • wirecard_sepa - Use the wirecard SEPA API
  • wirecard_checkout_page - Use the wirecard checkout page API
  • complex_config - a config management tool for ruby applications

Ansible

  • ansible-runit - A role to setup runit on centos systems
  • ansible-runit-structure - Setup basic runit structure for your service roles
